name: The Ball 2
description:
Description
The Ball 2 is a 2.5D physics based Platformer where you play as a Ball. You can finish little puzzles or play them against others in the Online mode. You can also play in the Challenge mode where you can play different challenges and compete with all other players for the fastes finish Time! The Ball 2 also has a Level editor and Steam Workshop Support for levels made by the community. The Ball 2 also saves Replays of your best best runs and if you got the world record your run gets uploaded so that all other players can see it.

Join Discord

Features
    🔸Play against your Friends or others in online Multiplayer!
    🔸Get the World record for the fastes finish time!
    🔸Unlock Cosmetics that you can find hidden in some levels!
    🔸The Game records replays of your best runs! And uploads them if its the world record!

    🔸Leaderboards for all Levels!
    🔸Level editor so you can build you own levels!
    🔸Steam Workshop so that you can also upload your levels!
    🔸Play your own Levels in Multiplayer!
